# Making noisewalker jobs

```{r}
library(noisewalker)
```

Read password.

```{r}
this_password <- readLines("data/password")
```

```{r}
make_jobs(octaves = 1,
          f = c(1, 4, 8),
          ft = c(1, 4, 8),
          s_range = 0.5,
          genmax = 20000,
          tmax = 100,
          n_rep = 5,
          ssh_con = "p284074@peregrine.hpc.rug.nl",
          password = this_password)
```
